article_title: Honda to shut down North American factories for six days
article_description: Honda said Wednesday it will shutter all of its North American factories for six days due to an expected decline in the market related to the economic fallout from the spread of COVID 19  a disease caused by coronavirus  The stoppage will affect about 27 600
article_content: Honda said Wednesday it will shutter all of its North American factories for six days due to an expected decline in the market related to the economic fallout from the spread of COVID 19  a disease caused by coronavirus The stoppage will affect about 27 600   1218 chars
